ä¿‚æ³¢è˜­ä½ å¯ä»¥å””æ´—ç‰Œéƒ½å¯ä»¥æ“æœ‰å¸ƒè¢‹å½ˆ, æ©¡è† å­å½ˆæ§

å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³åšJohn Wick


Perfecta Tactical Pen 2 is a tactical gadget for everyday use for all lovers of military and survival.

It was made of reinforced aluminum, which makes it practically "indestructible" in everyday use.

The non-slip aluminum texture guarantees a secure and comfortable writing grip as well as during emergency use.

Equipped with an aggressive glass breaker, which also acts as a self-defense kubotan.

The pen works after turning the bottom of the body.

It has a metal clip for attaching a shirt or belt to a pocket.

Extreme durability and rescue function - these are the features that make the Perfecta Tactical Pen 2 stand out.

It is a great gift proposal for every man.
